library.description: HITEC University Library forms an essential complement of academic pursuits of our faculty and students. The Library provides access to materials and information resources which will help you in your studies. All new students are offered an orientation tour of the Library.

library.hours: Open late night Monday–Friday; occasionally weekends

collections.professionalJournals: Printed and online versions covering Engineering & Sciences departments
collections.HECjournals: Access to HEC‑provided journals and magazines

library.staff: Qualified library sciences staff available for search and referral services

informationTechnologyServices.description: IT Services creates a digital campus—managed PCs/laptops, storage, email, networking, multimedia, enterprise applications—to support learning, teaching, research, and administration, ensuring students and staff can be as creative and productive as possible.
informationTechnologyServices.campusManagementSystem: Online admissions, semester registrations, student fees, attendance, evaluations, result compilation, transcript and degree generation
informationTechnologyServices.architectureSecurityIntrusionDetection: Managed via open-source IDS, modern security appliances for network protection; supports file servers, domain controller, network management, Wi-Fi
informationTechnologyServices.equipment: Routers with OSPF and ACL, manageable layer-2 switches for VLANs, F‑5200 firewall; 3000 active network users
informationTechnologyServices.PERN: Pakistan Education and Research Network connects HITEC University to other research institutes via high-speed bandwidth for collaboration and videoconferencing
informationTechnologyServices.dataCentre: Private cloud and cluster services for application deployment without managing hardware/software layers
informationTechnologyServices.libraryAutomation: Gigabit optical fiber to data center; EM security and LibMax for book check‑in/out; connected to HEC digital library via public IP
informationTechnologyServices.onlineEducationSetup: G Suite Education: official email, 5 TB Google Drive, Classroom, Meet, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Sites, Calendar, Google support; Google Classroom for virtual teaching and timely student–teacher collaboration
